title: For development of land for transit camp/mill workers housing undertaken by MHADA, FSI up to 4
clause_text: For development of land for transit camp/mill workers housing undertaken by MHADA, FSI up to 4.0including Zonal (basic) FSI shall be allowed onland earmarked for MHADA/Mill Workers Housing under Regulation No 35 subject to following conditions -
section: 33(15) - Development of land earmarked for the MHADA/Mill Workers Housing under Regulation No 35.
